# update(_:forFileAt:)

**Instance Method**

Provides searchable attributes for a file at the specified URL.

## Declaration

```swift
func update(_ attributes: CSSearchableItemAttributeSet, forFileAt contentURL: URL) throws
```

## Parameters

- **attributes**: The attribute set for the file at `contentURL`.
- **contentURL**: The URL of the file to provide attributes for.

## Discussion

When Core Spotlight invokes this method, update the properties of the attribute set according to the content in the specified file. For a complete list of properties available, see [doc://com.apple.corespotlight/documentation/CoreSpotlight/CSSearchableItemAttributeSet].
title: update(_:forFileAt:)
